class.name: ontology.classes.Object
class.description: Represents anything that is not a: - Agent - Crowd - Urban block - Area - Position - Planned work

method.name: canBeExtinguished
method.description: Returns true if this entity can be extinguished by agent Unit.

method.name: extinguishIt
method.description: An agent's physical ability to extinguish this 'Fire' object.

return.description: Returns true once action completion is done.

method.name: isExtinguished
method.description: Returns true once this entity is extinguished.

method.name: isBuilt
method.description: Returns true if this element is entierly built.

method.name: canBeCreated
method.description:
Returns 'True' if agent has the physical capability to create and build this element.
This implementation returns true if agent has the physical capability and has the resource capacities to build this element.

method.name: createIt
method.description: To create and build this element.

method.name: deconstructIt
method.description: To deconstruct (and then remove) this element. Returns 'true' when element is deconstructed.

method.name: removeIt
method.description: To remove instantaneously an existing work without any physical capability considerations.

method.name: createLinkWith
method.description: To create a link with a resource node in order to make this element getting some resource.

argument.name: resourceNode
argument.description: The resource node to get resource from.

method.name: disableIt
method.description: Stops a system from being activated. A deactivated system can't be used.

method.name: enableIt
method.description: Must be called on a system that requires activation in order to be used.

method.name: operateIt
method.description: To manage and run this element in order to activate it. Operating a 'system' object is a permanent effect. The object is activated until tthe agent Unit is operating it.

method.name: filter
method.description:
To filter crowds that interact with this element. Returns true once the filtration has just started.
This implementation returns true once the crowds filtration property is running.

argument.name: intensity
argument.description: The strenght that is used to filter crowds. The value is defined between 0 and 100. A value of '0' means "no filtration at all". A value of '100' means "totally blocked" (the crowds that interact with the checkpoint cannot go through it).

method.name: decontaminateMe
method.description:
To decontaminate me through this element.
Returns 'true' once decontamination is complete, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: isDeconstructed
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this element has been deconstructed (by deconstruction action or a "magic" destruction action),'false' otherwise.
This implementation returns 'true' if this object is valid, means that the real object doesn't exist anymore, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: canBeDeconstructed
method.description:
Returns 'true' if agent is able to deconstruct this element.
This implementation returns 'true' if agent has physical capabilities or if deconstrcution is 'instanteneous' ('instantaneously' parameter is set to 'true'); 'false' otherwise.

argument.name: instantaneously
argument.description: Define if this element has to be deconstructed instantaneously ("magic" action) or not.
